item.description:
[b]"THE LARGEST SINGLES DANCE ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND."

Friday, APRIL 30, The DOUBLETREE HOTEL, 550 Winter St., Waltham. (781)890-6767 Exit 27B off Rte. 128/95.
www.se-4u.com.
Dancing with music by award-winning DJ from 8:30-12:00 AM.
Free door prizes, raffles, and MATCH GAME prizes.
Free WEST COAST SWING dance lessons 7:30-8:30.
HUNDREDS OF SINGLES, 35-60 years old.
Cost is $12 ALL NIGHT.
Proper business dress requiredâ€¦sports jacket, or tie, for men required; business or party finery for women.
Info: call (781)446-0234.

OPEN TO THE PUBLIC; MEMBERSHIP NOT REQUIRED.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Pam at the door.
item.name: *NEW* "THE SINGLE EXECUTIVES CLUB" SINGLES DANCE
